title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-6.4 - Special purpose files
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-6.4 - Special purpose files

State Regulations

Files of vouchers and purchase orders shall be
maintained by serial number with the most recent number being placed on top. If
an additional set is maintained, such additional set should be maintained in
alphabetical order by name of vendor. Ledgers shall be kept by account number. All other special purpose items shall be kept as required for easy and frequent
reference. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-6.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
